TEXT.TITLE: BERTELSMANN TO MARKET APPLE SOFTWARE IN GERMANY
TEXT.BODY: Mixed media group Bertelsmann AG <BETG.F> said its subsidiary Publicsoft GmbH has agreed to market Apple Computer Inc's <AAPL.O> software products to the specialized West German computer retail trade. The cooperation agreement between Publicsoft and Apple's West German subsidiary Apple Computer GmbH did not involve either company taking any kind of financial stake in the other, a Bertelsmann spokesman said. He declined to say how much the agreement was worth. Reuter
